dict.acceptation: <美国、加拿大>纨绔子弟，花花公子；<俚>男人，家伙；

sent.orig: Kirk Lazarus:I know who I am! Im the dude playing the dude as another dude!
sent.trans: 科克兰泽：我知道我是谁！我是在电影里演那个假扮另一个家伙地家伙！

sent.orig: Zac Efron: Dude, you are such a poet.
His immaculate appearance gave him the nickname of "The Dude" among some.
sent.trans: 他那一尘不染的外表，使他在有些人之中赢得了“花花公子”的浑名。

sent.orig: A: Hey,dude, can you scratch my back?
Phil: Dude, we're in a locker room. Make it clear you're talking about a lizard.
sent.trans: 菲尔：老兄，我们可是在储藏室。说清楚点儿你指的是只蜥蜴。
